name: Russian Roulette: One Life
description: Russian Roulette: One Life is an experimental, free to play, skill based game which gives you only ONE LIFE to play the game. If you die in the game, you can't play it again. Your score before death determines how close your gravestone is to the center.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any Modern Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 250 MB available space
